summary: Feel the festive season on your Skyrim main menu. Altough with new background and music complete with snow particle effects, the main menu still captures the essence of skyrim making it usable all year round.
descriptionHtml:
[color=palevioletred][center][font=Arial Narrow][size=5]Feel the festive season on your Skyrim main menu. Although with new background and music complete with snow particle effects, the main menu still captures the essence of Skyrim making it usable all year round.[/font][/color][/center][/size]
[youtube]IZF9-zPwDqg[/youtube]

Didnt make the background on this one, credits to Dr Ravenholm
Snow particles adapted from lozzer22

[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/oSklZTr.png[/IMG]
